feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.97.0
entry.content:
A small release with support for indexing Fusion360 and Inventor files, plus a bugfix for the "update all" button in the last release.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Add support for Fusion360 and Inventor files by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3445

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix "update all" button by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3446

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Minor translation updates by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3443
  • Minor polish translation update by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3444

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.96.0...v0.97.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.97.1
entry.content:
Bugfixes for model merging and submitting reports.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix errors when merging models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3448
  • Fix error when members try to report models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3449
  • Don't show site settings link to members by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3450

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.97.0...v0.97.1

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.98.0
entry.content:
Various bugfixes and background improvements, and an option to disable the "running as root" warning for when you KNOW it's really safe to do so, like on a PaaS.

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • add SUDO_RUN_UNSAFELY env var to disable root security warning by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3465

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Add option for whether or not to use path-style URLs for non-AWS S3 services by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3458
  • Fix s3 path-style parameter filtering by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3459
  • Fix case-sensitivity in public IDs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3461
  • Fix unfollowing remote actors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3470

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • add concrete type field to creator activitypub objects by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3460
  • Configure SSL and hostname in dev mode for use with ngrok tunnels by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3467
  • Add concrete type to User activitystreams representation by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3468
  • Add trust & safety category to release notes by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3469

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.97.1...v0.98.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.99.0
entry.content:
Two main features in this release: first, you can now customise the ignored files and folders list for disk scanning, which should help keep things tidy; and second, we've got more federation support for creator profiles.

Now, if you follow a creator on another Manyfold instance, it will appear in your local creator list, and you can assign models to it, as well as easily visiting the original profile. You can also search for Fediverse addresses straight from the main search box - try following @floppy@manyfold.floppy.org.uk to see it in action!

There's more federation work coming soon, so stay tuned!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Include followed remote creators in list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3478
  • Configure files / directories that should be ignored during scan by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3434
  • Entering fediverse username in main search redirects to follow page by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3490

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix problems with searching for remote fediverse users by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3488
  • Use simpler regexp output for file settings form by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3489

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Store activitypub extension data for remote actors by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3472
  • Include creator caption and notes in activitystream summary by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3473
  • Add creator links as attachments in activitystreams by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3477
  • Order libraries by name, by default by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3481
  • Reorganise creator display a little for remote creators by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3482
  • Rename extension namespace to f3di by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3483

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.98.0...v0.99.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.99.1
entry.content:
Quick fix for third-party S3 services after AWS introduced new default security settings.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Roll back AWS SDK version to fix third-party S3 services by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/3491

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.99.0...v0.99.1
